taskbody.context:
Overview
This procedure provides instructions on how to upgrade a VNF of any type.
During the SU the following might occur:
If an error occurs during the upgrade that requires you to back out of the SU, contact Nokia Professional Services to determine the backout strategy.
A switchover might cause the traffic to go down on IOHO and IOHD VMs.
If you need to back out, use the procedure . To upgrade the VNF:

step.cmd: If this VNF is an ME or IG site, set the ME version parameter in the SM GUI to the FROM load value using the procedure .
Generate the TaskList file using the procedure .
Check the health of the NCC by using the procedure .
Execute the pAutoSU script. See for information about how to execute the pAutoSU script.
